xml:
Novofem<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms in women with a uterus

Osteoporosis prophylaxis in women with a uterus

By mouth

  • Adult

    1 tablet daily for 16 days, red tablets to be taken, then 1 tablet daily for 12 days, white tablets to be taken, subsequent courses are repeated without interval; start treatment with red tablet at any time or if changing from cyclical HRT, start treatment the day after finishing oestrogen plus progestogen phase.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
